lead_paragraph: Readers write that the Republican candidates “share the blame” for the uncivil tone of the last debate and suggest a format for the next one.

headline.main: The Next Republican Debate: For Civility and Substance
headline.print_headline: The Next G.O.P. Debate: For Civility and Substance

snippet: Readers write that the Republican candidates “share the blame” for the uncivil tone of the last debate and suggest a format for the next one.
